DOC.brief_summary: To determine ultrasound measurement renal carotid arterial resistive index associate post-cardiac surgery acute kidney injury .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Accuracy Doppler Resistive Indices Early Diagnosis Acute Kidney Injury .
DOC.criteria: adult patient > = 18 year undergoing cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass transesophageal echocardiography ( TEE ) probe placement chronic kidney disease ( estimate GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 ) prior carotid endarterectomy know carotid artery stenosis 50 % great dissection aneurysm involve renal carotid artery schedule aortic aortic valve surgery heart transplant intraaortic balloon pump , ventricular assist device , exctracorporeal membrane oxygenation support .
